entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued July 06 at 1:14PM AKDT until July 08 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RED FLAG WARNINGS REMAIN IN EFFECT FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 220, 221, 222, 223, AND 224... Potential for abundant lightning continues in the forecast area with the thermal trough lying from the AlCan Border Crossing to just east of Arctic Village, then west across the Arctic Plain. The thermal trough will rotate to the west and northwest Thursday.
